original_text: And the king of Assyria hearkened unto him: for the king of Assyria went up against Damascus, and took it, and carried the people of it captive to Kir, and slew Rezin.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 그 청을 듣고 곧 올라와서 다메섹을 쳐서 점령하여 그 백성을 사로잡아 기르로 옮기고 또 르신을 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Assyria hearkened unto him:
for the king of Assyria went up against Damascus,
and carried the people of it captive to Kir,
